```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
library(languageR)
library(corpora)
library(sjPlot)
library(gridExtra)
library(ggeffects)
library(ordinal)
library(rcompanion)
library(lme4)
```

```{r}
s1_data = read_csv("s1_data.csv")
```

```{r}
test1 = s1_data %>%
  filter(task %in% c("written")) %>%
  filter(lexicalCategory %in% c("adjective","onomatopoeia and interjections"))
```

```{r}
a1 <-lmer (rating ~ lexicalCategory + (1|subjCode) + (1|word),  data = test1)
b1 <-lmer (rating ~ 1 + (1|subjCode) + (1|word),  data = test1)
```

```{r}
test2 = s1_data %>%
  filter(task %in% c("written"))

test2$residRating = resid (lmer (rating ~ logFreq + concreteness + phonemes + totalMorphemes + babyAVG + (1|subjCode),  data = test2, na.action = na.exclude))

a2 <- lmer(residRating ~ X30mos + (1|subjCode), data = test2)
b2 <- lmer(residRating ~ 1 + (1|subjCode), data = test2)
```
